headline: Will Altria’s (MO) Struggle With Smokeable Volumes Reshape Its Competitive Edge?
summary: Altria Group reported its fiscal 2025 third quarter results in the past week, showing adjusted earnings per share slightly ahead of expectations but a 3% year-on-year revenue decrease driven by continued softness in smokeable products. This points to persistent challenges from volume declines and increasing competitive pressures compared to other major industry players. We'll explore how the recent revenue drop and ongoing volume concerns affect Altria's broader investment narrative and...
